tool_description: Use natural language to get rgb, hex, hsl color. Get the complementary, monochromatic, triadic, tetradic, analogous scheme for any color.
title: Color

api_list.name: Color Palette Schemes
api_list.description: Given a hexadecimal color return a list of common schemes like complementary, triadic, tetradic, analogous, monochromatic.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://color11.p.rapidapi.com/palette/{hexadecimal}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "color11.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: NLP Color Picker
api_list.description: Given a word or phrase returns a likely color representation in rgb, hex, and hsl.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://color11.p.rapidapi.com/color/{colorname}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "color11.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
